skills.Title: Musician

skills.Content: I played rugby from age 14  till 16 for my HighSchool (ElsiesRiver HighSchool)

skills.Content: I have knowledge on the coding languages HTML, CSS, Javascript and Vue.Js

projects.Title: Working JSON server deployed from git

testimonials.Title: Marcel Brown
testimonials.Content: Jason is a funny and charismatic person who inspires me everyday. He is a great role model and has humble qualities that will bring him very far in life. He is an amazing friend to all

testimonials.Title: Zubair Matthee
testimonials.Content: Jason is an amazing person,he has charisma, and kindness that make him stand out from the crowd. He always approaches his work with a deep sense of passion and purpose. He is driven to a goal and works hard to achieve it

testimonials.Title: Jason Viljoen
testimonials.Content: Jason is a hard working,he never stops until the job is done. Wheter he is working on a project for work or helping out a friend in class, he is always doing things to the best of his ability.He is driven by a strong work ethic adn desire to succeed

testimonials.Title: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.Content: Jason is someone who gets along well with his peers. He puts 100% into every task presented to him. He lends a helping hand where needed, he is trustworthy and shows good leadership skills. I would recommend him to any company as he would be a valuable asset wherever he goes

testimonials.Title: Uthmaan Samsoien
testimonials.Content: Jason is a very determined being, always focused and wanting to get things done on time. This is an excellent trait to have as web developer as you will always be on par with deadlines.

testimonials.Title: Imtiyaaz
testimonials.Content: Jason is very good when working alone and even better when he is put into a group. He is always trying to upskill his self by asking questions or learning from his peers, this making him a very hard working being. He is very good in HTML and CSS. Jason is kind and is good with working with people.
